page.title: Delta to Cut 6,000-6,900 Jobs
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - Delta Air Lines <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A> on Wednesday said it plans to eliminate between 6,000 and 6,900 jobs during the next 18 months, implement a 10 percent across-the-board pay reduction and reduce employee benefits.
